mapper.select: SELECT no, contentid, title, address, image1, hit, contenttype FROM seoultravel WHERE contenttype = #{contenttype} ORDER BY no ASC OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT 12 ROWS ONLY

SELECT st.no, title, address, image1, x, y, hit, at.infocenter, at.restdate, at.usetime, at.parking, at.msg FROM seoultravel st JOIN attraction at ON st.contentid = at.contentid WHERE st.contentid = #{contentid}
SELECT no, contentid, title, address, image1, hit, contenttype FROM seoultravel WHERE address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' ORDER BY no ASC OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT 12 ROWS ONLY
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM seoultravel WHERE address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%'
SELECT no, contentid, title, address, image1, hit, contenttype, rownum FROM (SELECT no, contentid, title, address, image1, hit, contenttype FROM seoultravel ORDER BY hit DESC) WHERE rownum <=5
